title: How Pre-Settlement Funding Works: The Process Explained
text:
How Pre-Settlement Funding Works: The Process Explained

Oasis Financial topic overview for agent reference. Not legal advice.

- Pre-settlement funding is non-recourse; repayment is only from settlement.
- Requires attorney representation.
- Approval based on case merits and expected settlement value.
- Common uses: rent, utilities, groceries, medical bills.
- Timelines vary by case type/state and attorney responsiveness.

This information is general and not legal advice.
